author: Anna Silman
title: Diary of a Hospital: Losing Hope in the ICU
description: “I don’t know how long I can keep doing this for.”
content: As the COVID-19 crisis continues to unfold, the medical staff at Mount Sinai Brooklyn is providing regular dispatches about the daily experience fighting the virus. While there have been glimmers of good news lately, with indications that New Yorks curve may … [+7714 chars]
